result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon A. Sledge

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Barth.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  On State's motion, this case is dismissed and read in for sentencing in files 14CF596, 14CF1121 & 14CF1242.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Barth.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Barth states they are working toward resolution.  STC continued to 5/6/15 at 8:45am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney M Barth.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Barth states he is new to the case and needs to meet w/ADA McNeill to ensure he has all discovery.  STC continued to 3/25/15 at 1:15pm.  Bond continued.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney C Lassiter.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Lassiter states the deft would like new public defender representation.  Deft agrees.  Court allows Atty Lassiter to withdraw.  STC continued to 3/4/15 at 8:30am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Atty C Lassiter appeared on behalf of deft.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Deft in custody but not brought over.  Atty Lassiter states she still needs to review video with deft in the jail.  STC continued to 1/21/15 at 8:45am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney C Lassiter.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Lassiter states they have been provided with global resolution offer.  JS of 12/8/14 at 9am is removed from the calendar; STC is set for 12/12/14 at 10am.  Bond continued.

Judge Chad Kerkman, Acting Br. 6 for today only.  Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty Carmen Lassiter.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Case is not resolved.  Jury status hearing 12/4/14 at 1:15.  Jury selection 12/8/14 at 9:00.  Jury trial 12/9/14 at 9:00.  Bond continued.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney C Lassiter.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Lassiter acknowledges receipt and waives reading.  Deft enters not guilty plea.  DA PTC 9/19/14 at 1:30pm and FPT 10/6/14 at 10:30am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State. Def. appeared in court with Atty. Carmen Lassiter. Clerk LE.  Plea offer placed on the record by the State.  Prelim. waived, probable cause found. Bound over to Br. 6 for arraignment on 9-15-14 @ 8:15am. Information filed. Bond continued.

144 p.m.  Attorney Patrick Anderson appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney K Watson. Clk  LE.  Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; set before Comm Mason on 8/19/14 @ 845 a.m.    Warrant vacated.  $1500 Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).
and witness list filed by the State
